title: (Apply via form) Property management entry level
job_overview:
To apply: Apply via online jobs THEN APPLY VIA THIS FORM: forms. office. c om /r/CzRaLasknL REMOVE SPACES/FIX LINK, I WILL NOT REPLY TO YOUR APPLICATION UNLESS YOU APPLY BOTH VIA THE FORM AND ALSO ONLINE JOBS.  THE JOB POSITION FOR THIS TITLE IS "PROPERTY MANAGEMENT ENTRY-LEVEL" 

QA staff's time
Perform investigations
Enforce sträva updates
Help get staff to locations
Check utilities
Nag detailers/cleaners

This is entry level position. $2/hr.

This can grow into a higher responsibility role, our top performers make $7-9/hr USD

Schedule is Usa T W TH F Sat 930AM PST -5PM PST with an optional 6th day if you want more hours

Minimum requirements: i5 PC, 8GB ram, Solid state hard drive, computer mouse, or any Mac pc with 8gb ram or higher.
